}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The part number silkscreened on the card may be 52-0000397-00.
The FCC test report lists the following models as identical.. *LevelOne WPC-0101 *PLANET WL-3553 *PheeNet WL-0011RT *JAHT WN-1011P(E) / WN-1011P(P) *EUSSO GL2411-01R / WL-RTL8108 *CebitA AirWell CWL110C *Intellinet 520614 *Maxim Communications WL-1000R *XNET EW220C *LanTech WL-530 *MECER WL-530 *Genuine GE-WPC2011BED *Asante AL-1311-DP / AL-1311-PC (AeroLAN Wireless CardBus) *Peabird PEAB-WL / PCMCIA *CONNECTLAND WIRE-CNL-PCMCIA *MITSUBISHI VWCAA10 *AOpen AC802b-r *KOBISHI EW-7106PC *LanReady EW-7106PC *ConnectGear WE320 *Sweex LC500010 *Digitus DN-7001 *hama 49077 *Conceptronic C11CC *PCLine 777119 *Billionton WL-300RX-B / WL-300RX-N *WL-300RX-N
{{WiFiCert|W000888|03/28/2003}}
